data.name: The Healer
data.detailed_description:
THOUSANDS OF POSSIBILITIES!

Make your way to heal every innocent soul in randomly generated levels!
Loot dozens of weapons, pick the one that suits you, expand your Cards of Fate collection, gain permanent upgrades, choose your companion then start your adventure again and again! You can't stop until there is no corrupted soul left! And beware! Your sister will do anything to prevent you from that!

CAN YOU GET ZERO KILLS?

The Healer is a 2D Rogue-Lite game which you fight monsters to save them!
Every single weapon, companion, card and relic have it's own unique mechanic. Be sure to make your best combinations because this game is challenging!
Some weapons can harm them while purifying their corruption. Not just weapons, traps and corrupted ones can harm them too. So you have to find a way to heal them before they die. Keeping creatures alive is a though job.
And if you looking for even more challenge, you can choose just killing them and make bosses angry!




*Don't forget that this game is still in it's Alpha phase. Store page is still under construction and some visuals in screenshots are just placeholders.

Trailer Music by : Max_Momot

data.short_description: Can you get zero kills? It's a different experience than many other Action / Rogue-Lites. You won't fight the monsters to kill them but to cure their corruption! It's all your big sister's fault and only one who can fix this mess is you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4200H 2.80GHz or higher
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 1030 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4200H 2.80GHz or higher
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 1030 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
